column1: #: description: Ratio of $\rm {D}^{+}$ to $\rm{D}^{0}$ meson yield in pp collisions at $\sqrt{\rm{s_{NN}}}$=7 TeV in |y|<0.5 as a function of $p_{\rm T}$. The cross section for $\rm {D}^{0}$ and $\rm {D}^{+}$ mesons in pp collisions at $\sqrt{\rm{s_{NN}}}$=7 TeV were updated with respect to Eur.Phys.J. C77 no.8 (2017)550 to account for the change of the world-average BR of $\rm{D^{0}}\rightarrow K\pi$ and $\rm{D^{+}}\rightarrow K\pi\pi$ from ($3.93\% \pm 0.04$) to ($3.89\% \pm 0.04$)
#: keyword reactions: P PB --> D+ X | P PB --> D0 X
